text: New York State Route 258 (NY 258) is a state highway. All of the high way is inside the town of Groveland in Livingston County, NY. NY 63, another state highway, is connected to this NY 258. Another name for NY 258 is "Flats Road." It is named this because it was built in a flat area of land near Canaseraga Creek. Category:Roads in New York (state)
title: New York State Route 258
